QuestData.Title: Wild Mine Cart Ride
QuestData.Description: All you have to do is jump in and speak with Assistant Greely when you get to the bottom.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Mine Cart to take a ride to the end of the line and then speak with Assistant Greely.
QuestData.RewardText: As we would say in the Tinker's Union, out of the heat-applied metallic cooking container and into the oxydizing, energetic mixture of reacting gases and solids!
